alert.note: Alert for Martin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 8:33PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Martin County through 915 PM CDT... At 833 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trimont, or 15 miles northeast of Jackson In Jackson County, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Trimont around 845 PM CDT. Sherburn around 850 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Welcome. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 87 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
